brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel3.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 3.

brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel4.name: brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel4
brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel4.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 4.

brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel5.name: brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel5
brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel5.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 5.

brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel6.name: brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel6
brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel6.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 6.

brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel7.name: brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel7
brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel7.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 7.

brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel8.name: brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel8
brzaccVLAdbTxFailedModLevel8.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 8. Not applicable for units with HW revision A.

brzaccVLAdbCirTx.name: brzaccVLAdbCirTx
brzaccVLAdbCirTx.description: Applicable to AU Only. Not applicable to BreezeNET-B products. This parameter is not relevant for SU-EZ with SW 1.00.15 and it is 0. The value configured in the relevant SU for the CIR: SU to AU parameter.

brzaccVLAdbMirTx.name: brzaccVLAdbMirTx
brzaccVLAdbMirTx.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. The value configured in the relevant SU/RB for the MIR: SU/RB to AU/BU parameter. For SU-EZ SW version 1.00.15, it represents the value set in AU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbCirRx.name: brzaccVLAdbCirRx
brzaccVLAdbCirRx.description: Applicable to AU Only. Not applicable to BreezeNET-B products. This parameter is not relevant for SU-EZ with SW version 1.00.15 and it is 0. The value configured in the relevant SU for the CIR: AU to SU parameter.

brzaccVLAdbMirRx.name: brzaccVLAdbMirRx
brzaccVLAdbMirRx.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. This parameter is not relevant for SU-EZ with SW version 1.00.15 and it is 0. The value configured in the relevant SU/RB for the MIR: AU/BU to SU/RB parameter.

brzaccVLAdbCirMaxDelay.name: brzaccVLAdbCirMaxDelay
brzaccVLAdbCirMaxDelay.description: Applicable to AU Only. Not applicable to BreezeNET-B products. The value configured in the relevant SU for the CIR Maximum Delay parameter. It returns maximum value on 32 bits for SU-EZ with SW version 1.00.15 and this means NA (Not Available).

brzaccVLAdbDistance.name: brzaccVLAdbDistance
brzaccVLAdbDistance.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The distance between the SU/RB and the AU/BU (In Kilometers). It is not applicable for SU-EZ and it returns 0.

brzaccVLAdbHwRevision.name: brzaccVLAdbHwRevision
brzaccVLAdbHwRevision.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The SU/RB HW Revision. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbCpldVer.name: brzaccVLAdbCpldVer
brzaccVLAdbCpldVer.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The SU/RB CPLD Version. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbCountryCode.name: brzaccVLAdbCountryCode
brzaccVLAdbCountryCode.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The SU/RB country code. 9999 means unavailable country code.

brzaccVLAdbBootVer.name: brzaccVLAdbBootVer
brzaccVLAdbBootVer.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The SU/RB Boot Version. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbAtpcOption.name: brzaccVLAdbAtpcOption
brzaccVLAdbAtpcOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The SU/RB ATPC option configuration.

brzaccVLAdbAdapModOption.name: brzaccVLAdbAdapModOption
brzaccVLAdbAdapModOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The SU/RB adaptive modulation option configuration. It is not applicable for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbBurstModeOption.name: brzaccVLAdbBurstModeOption
brzaccVLAdbBurstModeOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The SU/RB burst mode option configuration. It is not applicable for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbConcatenationOption.name: brzaccVLAdbConcatenationOption
brzaccVLAdbConcatenationOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The SU/RB concatenation option configuration. It is not applicable for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbSecurityMode.name: brzaccVLAdbSecurityMode
brzaccVLAdbSecurityMode.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The SU/RB security mode configuration. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbAuthOption.name: brzaccVLAdbAuthOption
brzaccVLAdbAuthOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The SU/RB authentication algorithm configuration. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbDataEncyptOption.name: brzaccVLAdbDataEncyptOption
brzaccVLAdbDataEncyptOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU Only. The SU/RB data encryption option configuration. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbAge.name: brzaccVLAdbAge
brzaccVLAdbAge.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. The time since any packet was received from the relevant SU/RB.

brzaccVLAdbUnitName.name: brzaccVLAdbUnitName
brzaccVLAdbUnitName.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. The unit name of the relevant SU/RB. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbRSSI.name: brzaccVLAdbRSSI
brzaccVLAdbRSSI.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.1 and higher. The average Received Signal Strength Indication of frames received by the AU/BU from the relevant SU/RB. This value is given in dBm units.

brzaccVLAdbIpAddress.name: brzaccVLAdbIpAddress
brzaccVLAdbIpAddress.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.2.11 and higher. The Running IP address of the relevant SU/RB. Not available for SU-EZ with SW version lower than 1.1.1

brzaccVLAUNewAdbTable.name: brzaccVLAUNewAdbTable
brzaccVLAUNewAdbTable.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. AU/BU MAC Address New Database table idexed by MAC Address

brzaccVLAUNewAdbEntry.name: brzaccVLAUNewAdbEntry
brzaccVLAUNewAdbEntry.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. An entry in the AU/BU MAC Address New Database table.

brzaccVLNewAdbMacAddress.name: brzaccVLNewAdbMacAddress
brzaccVLNewAdbMacAddress.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The MAC Address of an SU/RB entry in the MAC Address Database table.

brzaccVLNewAdbIPaddress.name: brzaccVLNewAdbIPaddress
brzaccVLNewAdbIPaddress.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The Running IP address of the relevant SU/RB. Not available for SU-EZ with SW version lower than 1.1.1

brzaccVLNewAdbUnitName.name: brzaccVLNewAdbUnitName
brzaccVLNewAdbUnitName.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The unit name of the relevant SU/RB. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbUnitType.name: brzaccVLNewAdbUnitType
brzaccVLNewAdbUnitType.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The type of the relevant SU/RB. su-6-1D (3) : SU-6-1D (subscriber unit supporting 6 Mbps) Starting with 5.0 this is deprecated. When a SU-6-1D is upgraded to 5.0, its type will be changed to SU-6-BD. su-6-BD (4) : SU-6-BD (subscriber unit supporting 6 Mbps). su-24-BD (5) : SU-24-BD (subscriber unit supporting 24 Mbps). rb-B14 (8) : RB-B14 (BreezeNET Remote Bridge supporting 14 Mbps). rb-B28 (9) : RB-B28 (BreezeNET Remote Bridge supporting 28 Mbps). su-BD (10) : SU-BD (subscriber unit). su-54-BD(11) : SU-54-BD (subscriber unit supporting 54 Mbps). su-3-1D (12) : SU-3-1D (subscriber unit supporting 3 Mbps). Starting with 5.0 this is deprecated. When a SU-3-1D is upgraded to 5.0, its type will be changed to SU-3-BD. su-3-4D (13) : SU-3-4D (subscriber unit supporting 3 Mbps). Starting with 5.0 SW version this unit will work in BD mode suBD4900(18) : SU-BD-4900 (BreezeAccess 4900 subscriber unit) rb-B100 (20) : BU-B100 (BreezeNET Remote Bridge unlimited throughput) su-I (21) : SU-I su-EZ (23) : SU-EZ su-8-BD (27) : SU-8-BD (subscriber unit supporting 8 Mbps). su-1-BD (28) : SU-1-BD (subscriber unit supporting 1 Mbps). su-3-L (29) : SU-3-L (subscriber unit supporting 3 Mbps). su-6-L (30) : SU-6-L (subscriber unit supporting 6 Mbps). su-12-L (31) : SU-12-L (subscriber unit supporting 12 Mbps). su (33) : SU (security subscriber unit) na (255) : Not Available

brzaccVLNewAdbSwVersion.name: brzaccVLNewAdbSwVersion
brzaccVLNewAdbSwVersion.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SW version of the relevant SU/RB. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbHwRevision.name: brzaccVLNewAdbHwRevision
brzaccVLNewAdbHwRevision.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SU/RB HW Revision. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbCpldVer.name: brzaccVLNewAdbCpldVer
brzaccVLNewAdbCpldVer.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SU/RB CPLD Version. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbBootVer.name: brzaccVLNewAdbBootVer
brzaccVLNewAdbBootVer.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SU/RB Boot Version. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbCountryCode.name: brzaccVLNewAdbCountryCode
brzaccVLNewAdbCountryCode.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SU/RB country code. 9999 means unavailable country code

brzaccVLNewAdbCirTx.name: brzaccVLNewAdbCirTx
brzaccVLNewAdbCirTx.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. For BreezeNET-B products it is 0. For SU_EZ with SW version 1.00.15 is not relevant and it is 0. The value configured in the relevant SU for the CIR: SU to AU parameter.

brzaccVLNewAdbMirTx.name: brzaccVLNewAdbMirTx
brzaccVLNewAdbMirTx.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The value configured in the relevant SU/RB for the MIR: SU/RB to AU/BU parameter. For SU-EZ SW version 1.00.15, it represents the value set in AU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbCirRx.name: brzaccVLNewAdbCirRx
brzaccVLNewAdbCirRx.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. For BreezeNET-B products it is 0. This parameter is not relevant for SU-EZ with version 1.00.15 and it is 0. The value configured in the relevant SU for the CIR: AU to SU parameter.

brzaccVLNewAdbMirRx.name: brzaccVLNewAdbMirRx
brzaccVLNewAdbMirRx.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. This parameter is not relevant for SU-EZ with version 1.00.15 and it is 0. The value configured in the relevant SU/RB for the MIR: AU/BU to SU/RB parameter.

brzaccVLNewAdbCirMaxDelay.name: brzaccVLNewAdbCirMaxDelay
brzaccVLNewAdbCirMaxDelay.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. For BreezeNET-B products and SU-EZ with SW version 1.00.15 it is not relevant. The value configured in the relevant SU/RB for the CIR Maximum Delay parameter. It returns maximum value on 32 bits for SU-EZ with 1.00.15 and this means NA (Not Available).

brzaccVLNewAdbAtpcOption.name: brzaccVLNewAdbAtpcOption
brzaccVLNewAdbAtpcOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SU/RB ATPC option configuration.

brzaccVLNewAdbAdapModOption.name: brzaccVLNewAdbAdapModOption
brzaccVLNewAdbAdapModOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SU/RB adaptive modulation option configuration. It is not applicable for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbBurstModeOption.name: brzaccVLNewAdbBurstModeOption
brzaccVLNewAdbBurstModeOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SU/RB burst mode option configuration. It is not applicable for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbConcatenationOption.name: brzaccVLNewAdbConcatenationOption
brzaccVLNewAdbConcatenationOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SU/RB concatenation option configuration. It is not applicable for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbSecurityMode.name: brzaccVLNewAdbSecurityMode
brzaccVLNewAdbSecurityMode.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SU/RB security mode configuration. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbAuthOption.name: brzaccVLNewAdbAuthOption
brzaccVLNewAdbAuthOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SU/RB authentication algorithm configuration. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbDataEncyptOption.name: brzaccVLNewAdbDataEncyptOption
brzaccVLNewAdbDataEncyptOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The SU/RB data encryption option configuration. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLAdbWi2IPaddress.name: brzaccVLAdbWi2IPaddress
brzaccVLAdbWi2IPaddress.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The IP address of the Wi2 Access Point. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbStatus.name: brzaccVLNewAdbStatus
brzaccVLNewAdbStatus.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The status of the relevant SU/RB.

brzaccVLNewAdbAge.name: brzaccVLNewAdbAge
brzaccVLNewAdbAge.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The time since any packet was received from the relevant SU/RB.

brzaccVLNewAdbDistance.name: brzaccVLNewAdbDistance
brzaccVLNewAdbDistance.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The distance between the SU/RB and the AU/BU (In Kilometers). It is not applicable for SU-EZ and it returns 0.

brzaccVLNewAdbSNR.name: brzaccVLNewAdbSNR
brzaccVLNewAdbSNR.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The average Signal to Noise Ratio in dB of frames received by the AU/BU from the relevant SU/RB.

brzaccVLNewAdbMaxModulationLevel.name: brzaccVLNewAdbMaxModulationLevel
brzaccVLNewAdbMaxModulationLevel.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The value configured in the relevant SU/RB for the Maximum Modulation Level parameter. Modulation Level 8 is not applicable for units with HW revision A. It is not applicable for SU-EZ and it returns na.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxFramesTotal.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxFramesTotal
brzaccVLNewAdbTxFramesTotal.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of unicast frames (excluding retransmissions) that were successfully transmitted to the SU/RB over the wireless link.

brzaccVLNewAdbDroppedFramesTotal.name: brzaccVLNewAdbDroppedFramesTotal
brzaccVLNewAdbDroppedFramesTotal.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of frames intended to the SU/RB that were dropped because they were retransmitted to the extent of the maximum allowed number of retransmissions without being acknowledged.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel1.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel1
brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel1.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of unicast frames (excluding retransmissions) that were successfully transmitted to the SU/RB over the wireless link using modulation level 1.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel2.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel2
brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel2.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of unicast frames (excluding retransmissions) that were successfully transmitted to the SU/RB over the wireless link using modulation level 2.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel3.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel3
brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel3.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of unicast frames (excluding retransmissions) that were successfully transmitted to the SU/BU over the wireless link using modulation level 3.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel4.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel4
brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel4.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of unicast frames (excluding retransmissions) that were successfully transmitted to the SU/RB over the wireless link using modulation level 4.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel5.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel5
brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel5.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of unicast frames (excluding retransmissions) that were successfully transmitted to the SU/RB over the wireless link using modulation level 5.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel6.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel6
brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel6.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of unicast frames (excluding retransmissions) that were successfully transmitted to the SU/BU over the wireless link using modulation level 6.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel7.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel7
brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel7.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of unicast frames (excluding retransmissions) that were successfully transmitted to the SU/RB over the wireless link using modulation level 7.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel8.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel8
brzaccVLNewAdbTxSuccessModLevel8.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of unicast frames (excluding retransmissions) that were successfully transmitted to the SU/RB over the wireless link using modulation level 8. Not applicable for units with HW revision A.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel1.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel1
brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel1.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 1.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel2.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel2
brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel2.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 2.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel3.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel3
brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel3.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 3.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel4.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel4
brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel4.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 4.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel5.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel5
brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel5.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 5.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel6.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel6
brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel6.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 6.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel7.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel7
brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel7.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 7.

brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel8.name: brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel8
brzaccVLNewAdbTxFailedModLevel8.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Counts the total number of failures to successfully transmit unicast frames intended to the SU/RB using modulation level 8. Not applicable for units with HW revision A.

brzaccVLNewAdbMainSwVersion.name: brzaccVLNewAdbMainSwVersion
brzaccVLNewAdbMainSwVersion.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Main Software Version of SU. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbShadowSwVersion.name: brzaccVLNewAdbShadowSwVersion
brzaccVLNewAdbShadowSwVersion.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. Shadow Software Version of SU. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbReadOnlyCommunity.name: brzaccVLNewAdbReadOnlyCommunity
brzaccVLNewAdbReadOnlyCommunity.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher . SU/RB Read Only Community. Not available for SU-EZ.

brzaccVLNewAdbWriteCommunity.name: brzaccVLNewAdbWriteCommunity
brzaccVLNewAdbWriteCommunity.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. SU/RB Write Community The Community is accessible only with the Read-Write community string (administrator password). If the Read-Only community of the AU/BU is used this field will contain the SU/RB read-only community. Not available for SU-EZ with SW version lower than 1.1.1

brzaccVLNewAdbAIFS.name: brzaccVLNewAdbAIFS
brzaccVLNewAdbAIFS.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The Arbitration Inter-Frame Spacing (AIFS) of relevant SU/RB. Not available for SU-EZ and it returns 0.

brzaccVLNewAdbMinimumCW.name: brzaccVLNewAdbMinimumCW
brzaccVLNewAdbMinimumCW.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The Minimum Contention Window of relevant SU/RB. Not available for SU-EZ and it returns 0.

brzaccVLNewAdbMaximumCW.name: brzaccVLNewAdbMaximumCW
brzaccVLNewAdbMaximumCW.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The Maximum Contention Window of relevant SU/RB. Not available for SU-EZ and it returns 0.

brzaccVLNewAdbESSID.name: brzaccVLNewAdbESSID
brzaccVLNewAdbESSID.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The ESSID of relevant SU/RB. The ESSID is accessible only with the write community string (administrator password).

brzaccVLNewAdbRSSI.name: brzaccVLNewAdbRSSI
brzaccVLNewAdbRSSI.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.1 and higher. The average Received Signal Strength Indication of frames received by the AU/BU from the relevant SU/RB. This value is given in dBm units.

brzaccVLNewAdbDfsOption.name: brzaccVLNewAdbDfsOption
brzaccVLNewAdbDfsOption.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.5.21 and higher. The DFS option configuration received by the AU/BU from the relevant SU/RB.

brzaccVLAggregateMIRUplink.name: brzaccVLAggregateMIRUplink
brzaccVLAggregateMIRUplink.description: Applicable to AU only with SW version 6.0 and higher. Aggregate MIR uplink.

brzaccVLAggregateMIRDownlink.name: brzaccVLAggregateMIRDownlink
brzaccVLAggregateMIRDownlink.description: Applicable to AU only with SW version 6.0 and higher. Aggregate MIR downlink.

brzaccVLAggregateCIRUplink.name: brzaccVLAggregateCIRUplink
brzaccVLAggregateCIRUplink.description: Applicable to AU only with SW version 6.0 and higher. Aggregate CIR uplink.

brzaccVLAggregateCIRDownlink.name: brzaccVLAggregateCIRDownlink
brzaccVLAggregateCIRDownlink.description: Applicable to AU only with SW version 6.0 and higher. Aggregate CIR downlink.

brzaccVLMeasureUpLinkQualityIndicator.name: brzaccVLMeasureUpLinkQualityIndicator
brzaccVLMeasureUpLinkQualityIndicator.description: Applicable to SU/RB. Starts calculation of LQI. The calculation will be for a period of 10 seconds.

brzaccVLReadUpLinkQualityIndicator.name: brzaccVLReadUpLinkQualityIndicator
brzaccVLReadUpLinkQualityIndicator.description: Applicable to SU/RB. The results of the last LQI calculation. Range: 1 to 8.

brzaccVLUpLinkQualityIndicatorStatus.name: brzaccVLUpLinkQualityIndicatorStatus
brzaccVLUpLinkQualityIndicatorStatus.description: Applicable to SU/RB Only. Indicates the test conditions. fullTest means that there are no limitations on the range of available modulation levels, and that all modulation levels from 1 to 8 can be used. limitedTest indicates that the results may not indicate the true quality since the available range is limited - by HW (HW Revision A), or by the applicable parameters in the country code, or by the configurable Maximum Modulation Level parameter.

brzaccVLMacPinpointTable.name: brzaccVLMacPinpointTable
brzaccVLMacPinpointTable.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. A table that contains information about wireless device used by a certain Ethernet station in order to connect to the wireless network

brzaccVLMacPinpointEntry.name: brzaccVLMacPinpointEntry
brzaccVLMacPinpointEntry.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. An entry in the MAC Pinpoint Table. Each entry contains an Ethernet station MAC address and the MAC address of the wireless device used to connect it to the wireless network

mptEthernetStationMACAddress.name: mptEthernetStationMACAddress
mptEthernetStationMACAddress.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. The MAC address of the Ethernet station. It is used as an index in the MAC Pinpoint Table.

mptUnitMACAddress.name: mptUnitMACAddress
mptUnitMACAddress.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. The MAC address of the wireless device used by the station with the MAC Address from the index in order to access the wireless network.

brzaccVLDrapGatewaysTable.name: brzaccVLDrapGatewaysTable
brzaccVLDrapGatewaysTable.description: This table provides information about Gateways supporting DRAP that are registered at the AU

brzaccVLHiddenESSIDTable.name: brzaccVLHiddenESSIDTable
brzaccVLHiddenESSIDTable.description: Applicable to SU/RB only with SW version 5.0 and higher. The AU/BU units that rejected the subcribers because of worng ESSID

brzaccVLHiddenESSIDEntry.name: brzaccVLHiddenESSIDEntry
brzaccVLHiddenESSIDEntry.description: Applicable to SU/RB only with SW version 5.0 and higher. An entry in the Hidden ESSID table.

brzaccVLHiddenESSIDMacAddress.name: brzaccVLHiddenESSIDMacAddress
brzaccVLHiddenESSIDMacAddress.description: The MAC Address of the staion that rejected the subscriber beacuse of wrong ESSID

brzaccVLHiddenESSIDAge.name: brzaccVLHiddenESSIDAge
brzaccVLHiddenESSIDAge.description: The time (in second) passed since the corresponding AU/BU rejected the subscriber because of wrong ESSID

brzaccVLDrapGatewayIP.name: brzaccVLDrapGatewayIP
brzaccVLDrapGatewayIP.description: The IP address of the Gateway

brzaccVLDrapGatewayNoOfActiveVoiceCalls.name: brzaccVLDrapGatewayNoOfActiveVoiceCalls
brzaccVLDrapGatewayNoOfActiveVoiceCalls.description: The current number of active voice calls handled by the Gateway

brzaccVLAverageReceiveRSSI.name: brzaccVLAverageReceiveRSSI
brzaccVLAverageReceiveRSSI.description: Applicable to SU/RB only. The average Received Signal Strength Indication of frames. This value is given in dBm units.

brzaccVLCurrentNoiseFloor.name: brzaccVLCurrentNoiseFloor
brzaccVLCurrentNoiseFloor.description: Applicable to all units. The current Noise Floor of the unit.

brzaccVLAverageSignalInterferenceRatio.name: brzaccVLAverageSignalInterferenceRatio
brzaccVLAverageSignalInterferenceRatio.description: Applicable to all units. The current Average Signal Interference Ratio of the unit.

brzaccVLTrapSUMacAddr.name: brzaccVLTrapSUMacAddr
brzaccVLTrapSUMacAddr.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. SU/RB MAC Address.

brzaccVLTrapToggle.name: brzaccVLTrapToggle
brzaccVLTrapToggle.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. An On/Off toggle status.

brzaccVLTrapParameterChanged.name: brzaccVLTrapParameterChanged
brzaccVLTrapParameterChanged.description: Not applicable starting with version 5.0. Applicable to all units. A modification to one of the parameters related to CIR/MIR, IP Filtering or VLAN.

brzaccVLTrapAccessRights.name: brzaccVLTrapAccessRights
brzaccVLTrapAccessRights.description: Applicable to all units. The access rights used for login.

brzaccVLTrapLog.name: brzaccVLTrapLog
brzaccVLTrapLog.description: Applicable to all units. Login or logout to the Monitor program via Telnet.

brzaccVLTrapTelnetUserIpAddress.name: brzaccVLTrapTelnetUserIpAddress
brzaccVLTrapTelnetUserIpAddress.description: Applicable to all units. The IP address of a Telnet user.

brzaccVLTrapRTx.name: brzaccVLTrapRTx
brzaccVLTrapRTx.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. Retransmissions as a percentage of total transmissions.

brzaccVLTrapFtpOrTftpStatus.name: brzaccVLTrapFtpOrTftpStatus
brzaccVLTrapFtpOrTftpStatus.description: Applicable to all units. The status of the last FTP/TFTP loading procedure.

brzaccVLDFSMoveFreq.name: brzaccVLDFSMoveFreq
brzaccVLDFSMoveFreq.description: Applicable to AU/BU with HW revision B and lower (for units with HW revision C and higher replaced by brzaccVLTrapDFSMoveFreq New to support a resolution of 0.5 MHz). The new frequency in MHz after detecting radar on a previous channel.

brzaccVLDFSMoveFreqNew.name: brzaccVLDFSMoveFreqNew
brzaccVLDFSMoveFreqNew.description: Applicable to AU/BU. The new frequency in MHz after detecting radar on a previous channel. (Replaces brzaccVLDFSMoveFreq to support a resolution of 0.5 MHz for units with HW revision C and higher. If HW revision is B it will contain the same value as brzaccVLDFSMoveFreq, but represented as string.).

brzaccVLEthBroadcastThresholdExceeded.name: brzaccVLEthBroadcastThresholdExceeded
brzaccVLEthBroadcastThresholdExceeded.description: Applicable to all units. The number of packets that are dropped by the ethernet broadcast/multicast limiter.

brzaccVLTrapSubscriberType.name: brzaccVLTrapSubscriberType
brzaccVLTrapSubscriberType.description: Applicable to AUS only. The type of subscriber that was rejected by AUS

brzaccVLTrapMACAddress.name: brzaccVLTrapMACAddress
brzaccVLTrapMACAddress.description: Applicable to BU/RB only. The MAC address of the BNET B unit whose type has been changed

brzaccVLNewUnitTypeTrap.name: brzaccVLNewUnitTypeTrap
brzaccVLNewUnitTypeTrap.description: Applicable to BU/RB only. The new type of the BNET B unit.

brzaccVLTrapSWVersion.name: brzaccVLTrapSWVersion
brzaccVLTrapSWVersion.description: The SW version of the SU that tries to associate with a station that has Wireless Link Prioritization Enabled

brzaccVLTrapSequenceNumber.name: brzaccVLTrapSequenceNumber
brzaccVLTrapSequenceNumber.description: Apllicable to AU/BU only. Trap Variable indicating the sequence number of the last trap generated.

brzaccVLTrapUnitMacAddr.name: brzaccVLTrapUnitMacAddr
brzaccVLTrapUnitMacAddr.description: Applicable to all units. The MAC Address of the unit that is initiating the trap.

brzaccVLTrapParameterGroupCode.name: brzaccVLTrapParameterGroupCode
brzaccVLTrapParameterGroupCode.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. The code of group parameter that was changed.

brzaccVLTrapNewIP.name: brzaccVLTrapNewIP
brzaccVLTrapNewIP.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. The code of group parameter that was changed.

brzaccVLSUassociatedAUTRAP.name: brzaccVLSUassociatedAUTRAP
brzaccVLSUassociatedAUTRAP.description: An AU/BU trap indicating a new association with an SU/RB.

brzaccVLAUdisassociatedTRAP.name: brzaccVLAUdisassociatedTRAP
brzaccVLAUdisassociatedTRAP.description: An AU/BU trap indicating that an SU/RB has been disassociated from the AU/BU.

brzaccVLAUagingTRAP.name: brzaccVLAUagingTRAP
brzaccVLAUagingTRAP.description: An AU/BU trap indicating that the unit association was aged out and removed from the Association database following its failure to acknowledge a specified number of consecutive frames.

brzaccVLSUassociatedTRAP.name: brzaccVLSUassociatedTRAP
brzaccVLSUassociatedTRAP.description: Starting with 5.0 this trap is not generated. An SU/RB trap indicating association with an AU/BU. In addition to the MAC address information of the AU/BU, the trap also includes information on the average SNR of frames received from the AU/BU.

brzaccVLAUwirelessQualityTRAP.name: brzaccVLAUwirelessQualityTRAP
brzaccVLAUwirelessQualityTRAP.description: An AU/BU trap, indicating that the quality of the wireless link (retransmissions rate) has changed and dropped below (Off) or increased above (On) a threshold , defined by the *brzaccVLWirelessTrapThreshold. The threshold for AU/BU is a percentage of retransmissions.

brzaccVLPowerUpFromReset.name: brzaccVLPowerUpFromReset
brzaccVLPowerUpFromReset.description: An AU/BU trap indicating power up after Reset.

brzaccVLTelnetStatusTRAP.name: brzaccVLTelnetStatusTRAP
brzaccVLTelnetStatusTRAP.description: Applicable to all units. A trap indicating that a log-in or log-out has been performed via Telnet. Includes the log-in access right and the IP address of the PC performing Telnet.

brzaccVLParameterChangedTRAP.name: brzaccVLParameterChangedTRAP
brzaccVLParameterChangedTRAP.description: Starting with version 5.0, this trap is not generated. It is replaced by brzaccVLParameterChangeTRAP. Applicable to all units. A trap indicating a change in a CIR/MIR, IP Filter or VLAN parameter.

brzaccVLLoadingStatusTRAP.name: brzaccVLLoadingStatusTRAP
brzaccVLLoadingStatusTRAP.description: Applicable to all units. A trap indicating that last FTP/TFTP firmware loading process has been finished successfully or failed.

brzaccVLPromiscuousModeTRAP.name: brzaccVLPromiscuousModeTRAP
brzaccVLPromiscuousModeTRAP.description: An AU/BU trap, indicating that the AU/BU In (On) Promiscuous Mode or out (Off) Promiscuous Mode.

brzaccVLDFSRadarDetectedTRAP.name: brzaccVLDFSRadarDetectedTRAP
brzaccVLDFSRadarDetectedTRAP.description: DFS: Applicable to AU/BU only. A trap indicating that a radar was detected.

brzaccVLDFSFrequencyTRAP.name: brzaccVLDFSFrequencyTRAP
brzaccVLDFSFrequencyTRAP.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. A trap indicating that the unit moved to a new frequency.

brzaccVLDFSNoFreeChannelsExistsTRAP.name: brzaccVLDFSNoFreeChannelsExistsTRAP
brzaccVLDFSNoFreeChannelsExistsTRAP.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. A trap indicating that a radar was detected and there is no free channel.

brzaccVLEthBroadcastMulticastLimiterTRAP.name: brzaccVLEthBroadcastMulticastLimiterTRAP
brzaccVLEthBroadcastMulticastLimiterTRAP.description: Applicable to all units. The trap is sent if the ethernet broadcast filter threshold is exceeded and it contains the number of dropped packets.

brzaccVLAUSUnsupportedSubscriberTypeTRAP.name: brzaccVLAUSUnsupportedSubscriberTypeTRAP
brzaccVLAUSUnsupportedSubscriberTypeTRAP.description: Applicable to AUS only. This trap is generated when a subscriber with unsupported type tries to associate to AUS. The AUS supports only SU-3, SU-6, SU-V. If licensed, SU-54 is supported too. For 900 MHz band, AUS supports only SU-3. If licensed, SU-8 is supported too. The first variable of the trap is the subscriber MAC Address. The second variable is the type of subscriber

brzaccVLUnitTypeChangedTRAP.name: brzaccVLUnitTypeChangedTRAP
brzaccVLUnitTypeChangedTRAP.description: Applicable to BU/RB only. This trap is generated when the user changes the type of the BreezeNET B unit. The RB can be converted in BU or vice versa. The first variable of the trap is the unit MAC Address. The second variable is the new type of the unit

brzaccVLWLPrioritizationNotSupportedBySU.name: brzaccVLWLPrioritizationNotSupportedBySUTRAP
brzaccVLWLPrioritizationNotSupportedBySU.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. This trap is generated when an SU/RB with a SW version below 4.0 that does not support Wireless Link Prioritization is associated with an AU/BU with thw Wireless Link Prioritization Option enabled. The first variable of the trap is the SU/RB MAC Address. The second variable is the SW version of the SU/RB

brzaccVLParameterChangeTRAP.name: brzaccVLParameterChangeTRAP
brzaccVLParameterChangeTRAP.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 or higher. This trap is generated by AU/BU when a parameter from a group was changed. Also, if an SU/RB parameter is changed and if the parameter is in ADB the Au/BU will generate the trap for that SU/RB. brzaccVLTrapSequenceNumber - trap sequence number brzaccVLTrapUnitMacAddr - MAC Address of the AU/BU if the parametr was changed in AU/BU - MAC Address of the SU/RB if the parameter was changed in SU/RB brzaccVLTrapParameterGroupCode- Code of Parameter Group

brzaccVLRunTimeIPChangeTRAP.name: brzaccVLRunTimeIPChangeTRAP
brzaccVLRunTimeIPChangeTRAP.description: Applicable to AU/BU only with SW version 5.0 or higher. This trap is generated by AU/BU when the running IP of the unit was changed. Also, if the running IP of an associated SU/RB is changed this trap will be genarated by AU/BU. brzaccVLTrapSequenceNumber - trap sequence number brzaccVLTrapUnitMacAddr - MAC Address of the AU/BU if the running IP was changed in AU/BU - MAC Address of the SU/RB if the running IP was changed in SU/RB brzaccVLTrapNewIP - New IP of the unit.

brzaccVLDisassociateAllStationsTRAP.name: brzaccVLDisassociateAllStationsTRAP
brzaccVLDisassociateAllStationsTRAP.description: Applicable to AU/BU only. A trap indicating that all stations were disassociated.
